name: In Ground Sewer Checklist
The correct drawing has been used and it is issued for construction
All workers been inducted and read appropriate SWMS for tasks and prestart signed
Appropriate materials have been used for application and sizing is as per drawings
Invert levels been checked, pipework has correct fall as per drawing
Pipework bedding is correct material and depth
Q/A been done to ensure all pipework is in place and in correct position
All pipework is installed as per AS/NZS 3500
All floor wastes are charged by a fixture
All open ends are capped off/taped off
Signed off by Commodore Plumbing & RCC
In Ground Stormwater Checklist
The correct drawing has been used. Is it issued for construction and which issue is it
All workers been inducted and read appropriate SWMS for tasks and prestart signed
Appropriate materials have been used for application, also sizing is correct
Invert levels been checked, pipework has correct fall as per drawing
Pipework is secured properly, penetrations through pits are correct (pits by others)
Q/A been done to ensure all pipework is in place and in correct position (Plan attached)
Pipework has been tested and are all open ends capped/taped off
Signed off by Commodore Plumbing & RCC
In Ground Pressure Services Checklist
The correct drawing has been used and it is issued for construction
All workers been inducted and read appropriate SWMS for tasks and prestart signed
Appropriate materials have been used for application and sizing is as per drawings
Pipework bedding is correct material and depth
Q/A been done to ensure all pipework is in place and in correct position
All pipework is installed as per AS/NZS 3500
Pipework has been pressure tested for 24 hours - attach photo of pressure gauge
All open ends are capped off/taped off
Signed off by Commodore Plumbing & RCC
